name: Verify Paper Placement Does Not Block Neuros Terminal
description: Validates that the paper object placement does not obscure the Neuros terminal, preventing interaction.
testObjective: Confirm paper placement bug has been fixed and does not block terminal access.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Paper is on the floor (fallen from wall)

steps.action: Locate the paper on the floor in the cockpit
steps.expected: Paper is visible on the floor

steps.action: Click on the paper to pick it up
steps.expected: Paper is repositioned back to its original wall location

steps.action: Observe the Neuros terminal position relative to the paper
steps.expected: Paper does NOT obscure or cover the Neuros terminal

steps.action: Attempt to interact with the Neuros terminal
steps.expected: Neuros terminal remains fully accessible and interactable despite paper placement

postconditions: Neuros terminal is not blocked by paper
Player can access Neuros terminal normally
